website_summaries.verdict: An inexpensive entry-level clarinet that includes many needed starter accessories.
pros: Comes with mouthpiece, 2 barrels, case, stand (stored inside bell), book, 10 reeds, ligature and cap, cork grease, cleaning cloth, and gloves
Hard shell carrying case is durable and great for travel
cons: Use generous amounts of cork grease if you initially have trouble assembling it

customer_reviews.title: Better than renting. Beautiful sound.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4th grader in order to avoid renting an instrument for school. This clarinet has a beautiful sound. Sounded much better compared to the rented instrument. Bought size 2.0 reeds to use with this. The fit is tight. Definitely needed a lot of cork grease but nothing that my kid can't handle. The customer service is very responsive. I emailed with questions and they answered very promptly. If you're concerned on quality for your student player, just get this! You won't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: jamjules

customer_reviews.title: Great for my child in beginner band!
customer_reviews.text: Okay so we didn’t want to spend 1000 dollars on a clarinet that we weren’t sure our kid was going to wanna play after awhile. Checked on here and found this awesome buy. People acted as if it wouldn’t be good enough, but it is absolutely awesome! Very well built, sounds great, and came with everything that was expected. So so happy we found this clarinet!!
customer_reviews.author: JustJesus

customer_reviews.title: First clarinet in my life.
customer_reviews.text: I never played a clarinet before in my life. I bought this one to start a new hobby and I can tell you that I love it! It sounds very nice and it comes with a lot of extra items. Good price for the product.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Romero

customer_reviews.title: The clarinet looks great, but after a month of use the screw ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son who just started marching band. I didn’t want to invest much until I knew he would stick with it. The clarinet looks great, but after a month of use the screw holding the thumbpiece fell out. It works okay and serves it purpose. I’ve since bought a better instrument, but he uses this one as a backup and when he has to march in rain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Reed clamp
customer_reviews.text: Instrument sounds good, but the clamp to hold on the Reed is nearly impossible for 10 year old to get to stay where it should be. The taper on the clamp is a bit much so adult can turn the screw enough to hold it putting forth max strength. Hopefully this doesn't end up breaking the clamp.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy

customer_reviews.title: Lovely instrument with lovely low tones
customer_reviews.text: Superb sounds. I really like the lowest notes. I expect my love for it to endure.
customer_reviews.author: R. WHITBY

customer_reviews.title: One of the corks came loose in less than two wks
customer_reviews.text: Totally Disappointed. Purchased this Clarinet for my daughter as a gift for her 10th Birthday since she was starting music band that same week well it’s been a few days and a few practices and one of the corks came loose a bit not allowing proper installation of that piece and making it difficult to attach the two pieces together my daughter felt horrible thinking she did something wrong, what is there to do wrong in less then two wks the cork is not torn it simple came loose alone we don’t know how to repair and afraid to touch it. Not Happy!! I will be returning this item ASAP!
customer_reviews.author: Happy

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy used!
customer_reviews.text: Thought I would buy used to save myself a few dollars, that was a terrible idea! All the pieces of the instrument where there and intact, however there were no accessories whatsoever! No cork grease, no reeds, no cleaning cloth, and no gloves! Definitely not as advertised, be wary upon ordering used item! I know that buying used is always a risk, but I figured at least 90% of the pieces that said would be included would be there! I was absolutely wrong, will do more research on product next time for sure!
customer_reviews.author: Jamie Corrigan

customer_reviews.title: Garbage. Spend the extra and buy a better instrument
customer_reviews.text: Broke after 1 month. Garbage. Spend the extra and buy a better instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Stethatter

customer_reviews.title: Cecilios BREAK easily
customer_reviews.text: This clarinet almost made it through one school year without breaking. My son's new band teacher just told me that this brand of clarinet breaks very often. He doesn't recommend this brand, and now, neither do I.
customer_reviews.author: Liddy

customer_reviews.title: Slightly uncomfortable thumb rest and week reeds
customer_reviews.text: The clarinet is a great clarinet for student level bands and can still be decent in high school. The only problems that I had were that the thumb rest is kinda uncomfortable and the gloves are pretty useless. Everything else is fine, tone is good, the stand is decent, everything works normally. The cork grease is exceptional, not great but I can manage with it. The reeds however are kinda week as after only a week or so they begin to wear down and chip or bend. Was forced to use the reeds the school gave me.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Bullis

customer_reviews.title: Something is not right.
customer_reviews.text: Something is not right! The instrument is off by one note! No clue what is going on as I have never had this problem with any other clarinet I have played.
customer_reviews.author: KD

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend for student learning instrument.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my daughter for middle school band class. It is a great investment and the 20.00 extra is definitely worth it. We can really tell a difference in the sound quality as opposed to the last clarinet we purchased. Overall great price and we don’t have to worry about a school rental.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernScout41

customer_reviews.title: Nice clarinet
customer_reviews.text: It was a nice clarinet. It was pretty good for the amount of money that it cost. My daughter who is in 6th grade got to be apart of the band
customer_reviews.author: Princesamama80

customer_reviews.title: This instrument arrived in a very nice case. My daughter put it together in minutes ...
customer_reviews.text: This instrument arrived in a very nice case. My daughter put it together in minutes and played songs she learned from class. We rented one previously and by far this one was worth it. I would definitely recommend this company to other parents!!
customer_reviews.author: Mildred

customer_reviews.title: it’s awesome
customer_reviews.text: This is the second time i buy this item .. it’s awesome
customer_reviews.author: Yamen

customer_reviews.title: This item is crap would not recommend
customer_reviews.text: This item is crap would not recommend. Child's music teacher said it has been broke since we bought it.
customer_reviews.author: Shonda Walker

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good clarinet
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grand daughter's first year in band in school. The band teacher was impressed with the quality for a beginner's clarinet. Now I just wish she would practice with her classmates at thier house...LOL
customer_reviews.author: Edward W. Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Produces fairly good sound.
customer_reviews.text: For the price, this turned out better than expected for sound quality and durability for being used by a junior high student.
customer_reviews.author: Rebel C

customer_reviews.title: Spend a little more, get better quality
customer_reviews.text: My daughter had this for not even a month and it broke already. Only reason for the 2 stars is because the piece that broke is probably a fairly cheap fix, otherwise it would be a 1 star product.
customer_reviews.author: Pricilla Klibert

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very cheap and hard to put together and take apart ended up buying something else
customer_reviews.author: Katie Haynes

customer_reviews.title: ok student clarinet
customer_reviews.text: sound quality is not the best, but its good for beginning student. My son being playing it for 3 months now and is happy with it
customer_reviews.author: happy guy

customer_reviews.title: Overall, a solid entry level clarinet at a more than reasonable price.
customer_reviews.text: The construction is much higher quality than I had expected. (Ebonite version). However, the stand is entirely useless as it arrived missing a leg. Also, the lubricant tube is not a full tube and only lasted through 3 assembly/disassemblies. It might have been nice to have received another tube. Finally, as reported by others, the reeds are not the best. Overall, a solid entry level clarinet at a more than reasonable price.
customer_reviews.author: wanderer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it.
customer_reviews.text: Can not be tuned to 440 so can’t be used in a band.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The quality is very good.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is a part of her High School band and this is perfect for her. She is able to practice at home.
customer_reviews.author: Anya

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful! I surprised my teenager for Christmas. I don’t think she has put it down yet!
customer_reviews.author: Ronee Finch

customer_reviews.title: The item sisnt work now
customer_reviews.text: The item was good , and then it didnt work , its so bad to have an experience like this one
customer_reviews.author: Saleh sammour

customer_reviews.title: Surprised at the how nice the quality is for the price
customer_reviews.text: Surprised at the how nice the quality is for the price. My daughter is teaching herself how to play and I’ve been impressed with the quality.
customer_reviews.author: Fiabella Photography

customer_reviews.title: Fast shipment
customer_reviews.text: My student loves her new clarinet. All was as expected. Works great
customer_reviews.author: Veronica Slater

customer_reviews.title: Breaks fast
customer_reviews.text: Started off okay but broke after 2 months of very minimal use.
customer_reviews.author: Amber

customer_reviews.title: Love giving my sons opportunities
customer_reviews.text: The value of the instrument was great for a 1st time clarinet player. He loves it. And feels my home with beautiful noise daily.
customer_reviews.author: Msfantabulus

customer_reviews.title: wrong reeds
customer_reviews.text: The clarinet seems good enough, but once my son got it out and to school, his band teacher said the reeds were for an alto sax. Super disappointing since part of why we purchased this particular one was for the reeds.
customer_reviews.author: Mother of 5

customer_reviews.title: Product delivered without pieces
customer_reviews.text: This product doesn't include items that are listed in the description. I do not recommend the purchase of this item by anyone. When contacting support there isn't anything they can help you with. Extremely disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to put together
customer_reviews.text: Grandson loves this. He is in a band and this is absolutely perfect for him
customer_reviews.author: joyce a taylor

customer_reviews.title: Won’t save a marriage but will keep children happy and compliant
customer_reviews.text: Daughter needed one in a pinch . Sounds great! No complaints so far. Not sure how long it will last. The Price paid is on par with normal rental/repair.
customer_reviews.author: dinoman22

customer_reviews.title: Perfect beginners clarinet
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful. Great instrument for my nephew who is starting out in band this year. Far better price than what the school would charge for renting one. Good sound quality and beautiful finish. The case is durable and easy for him to take to school without worrying he might drop it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product
customer_reviews.text: Beautifully made, ligature is easy to use as well as the keys, cleaning is easy, plays perfectly
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Awesome matte finish
customer_reviews.text: My daugther love this clarinet, the matte finish is very nice & no finger prints.
customer_reviews.author: rbtamms

customer_reviews.title: Just as the picture shows is what I received.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing negative, purchased for daughters first year in band. Let's see if she sticks it out for more than two years then maybe we'll upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: David Siano

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this clarinet last year and when I got it, the thumb rest was broke. We went to a music shop to get it fixed but they couldn’t do anything. We’ve tried emailing to get our warranty that we got when we ordered it but no one has answered us even though we have emailed a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A, B flat, and G sound terrible
customer_reviews.text: This clarinet sounds decent as long as you do not need an a, g, or b flat- which you do for every song.
customer_reviews.author: Sami

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful instrument
customer_reviews.text: This was a beautiful instrument. I did not realize so much went into putting a clarinet together, but the instructions were helpful.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Broken and broken hearted
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. My son started band this year, and has barely been in bed for a month. The clarinet is not working. My son was so looking forward to being a clarinet player. I hate to see a young child sad because of a product.
customer_reviews.author: Krys K

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: beautiful instrument w good sound. good price for what all is included.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: This seemed like an ideal starter instrument for our son. It lasted less than a month before the cork completely came off the barrel. Be sure to buy a square trade warranty or you'll be sorry!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t sound right!
customer_reviews.text: This product was horrible since when I first got it. It didn’t even sound correctly and still doesn’t it only plays 5 notes which are d e f g and a other wise the bottom half sounds very buzzy and clogged
customer_reviews.author: Celestino

customer_reviews.title: Great set!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clarinet set for my child. I am really happy with it. Everything was put well together, looks great, and works great.
customer_reviews.author: Carolyn Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: IT IS AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: LOVED IT and I recommend it to all intermediate and beginners
customer_reviews.author: harry

customer_reviews.title: keys started falling off and cork was bad. This is being used by my son in ...
customer_reviews.text: After 6 months of light use the clarinet spring broke, keys started falling off and cork was bad. This is being used by my son in his band practice, the instructor says the clarinet is not usable in its current condition. We are trying to get it serviced under the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Otter

customer_reviews.title: ... gift for my daughter and she is absolutely in love with it
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my daughter and she is absolutely in love with it. She's ten years old and is part of her school pioneer sound group and plays this instrument beautifully.
customer_reviews.author: Katita

customer_reviews.title: Ok product
customer_reviews.text: Well my son like it and it's still working fine till this day, so I guess one can say it's an ok product.
customer_reviews.author: Naderge Charles

customer_reviews.title: This is a great instrument! It plays very nice notes
customer_reviews.text: This is a great instrument! It plays very nice notes! It comes with reeds, barrels, a mini pocket book, a cleaning rag, and the clarinet! I think you should get this! It's great! The case is also very nice a protective. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Has windy sound and hard to blow.
customer_reviews.text: The instrument is hard to blow and it had very windy sound. The joint of the parts are very dry probably result in wind leadkage.
customer_reviews.author: J H

customer_reviews.title: Not even 7 months old and falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for my son in March, it’s now Oct and parts are falling off... you think it would last longer than that?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cheapy product served 2 months exactly until return and product support window closed at Amazon!
customer_reviews.text: Bought 2 months ago for my 9 years boy! Thumb-rest support key just broken because of poor screw thread. So, he can not hold the clarinet and play. Don’t know where to repair it! He used it exactly up until product support window at Amazon has closed. Looks like I lost $100 because if this small piece was not properly manufactured.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Flute
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved using this instrument in the beginning band class she was in because it was easy for her to learn to play.
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Moore - Hunt

customer_reviews.title: Reeds?
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with reeds as advertised, so no idea how it sounds! Looks nice, though.
customer_reviews.author: CSanduskyPharmD

customer_reviews.title: Pay for what you get
customer_reviews.text: Not a value, if springs fall out and doesn’t play properly.
customer_reviews.author: V0215pa

customer_reviews.title: Good thing I bought the insurance and was able to get a refunds
customer_reviews.text: Will not buy again. The Clairent thumb rest had came off will not stay even when screwed, the G, A, F keys do not work. Good thing I bought the insurance and was able to get my money back. I do not recommend this purchase. My fourth grader missed out on a recitel for her class.
customer_reviews.author: Lor P.

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful product. My daughter uses it for school band class. Teacher said this company is hit or miss. Well was a hit for us.
customer_reviews.author: terrill h.

customer_reviews.title: Would not play C note
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son's 5th grade music program. My hope was to get a low to mid-priced instrument to see if he liked playing the clarinet before committing to a more expensive option. We ended up having to take it to two different woodwind specialists because the instrument for some reason would not play the C note. Between his music teacher and the two specialists it was determined that nothing was damaged on the clarinet, it was just a faulty instrument. This made the clarinet unfixable, unplayable, and unfortunately a big waste of money. I ended up having to rent a clarinet to make it through the rest of the school year.
customer_reviews.author: sosmom

customer_reviews.title: Manufacturer don’t respond
customer_reviews.text: We purchased the clarinet with a warranty, and we had an issue with the clarinet. It was missing a part and I tried reaching the manufacturer to get this issue resolved and I never was able to reach someone to help me with this issue. Therefore, my daughter got frustrated and decided to quit the band due to her clarinet being defective.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Edgington

customer_reviews.title: Missing stuff
customer_reviews.text: All tho it was a great price, I never got the stand, book, the 10 extra pieces nor my warranty papers
customer_reviews.author: Tasha Burton

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great price. A little hard to place pieces together. Great for beginner
customer_reviews.author: Heidi Adducci

customer_reviews.title: great Clarinet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loved the Clarinet. it has a really good sound and very affordable
customer_reviews.author: ken turner

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Clarinet
customer_reviews.text: Not a good clarinet at all. I bought this for my daughter and had her band teacher help her and they couldn't even get a sound out of. It's garbage. If you really need a clarinet, spend the extra money or rent a good quality clarinet that will actually work.
customer_reviews.author: Sjiab

customer_reviews.title: she couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.text: My daughter bought this with her hard earned money and loves it. uses it for school every day. she couldn't be happier.
customer_reviews.author: joan

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for beginners. Looks like wood, and plays well. Get this clarinet for a beginner, and upgrade later.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Thankful

customer_reviews.title: A very good purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my fifth-grade son and he loves it! It comes with absolutely everything you need for the clarinet. A very good purchase!
customer_reviews.author: S.A.

customer_reviews.title: Good starter clarinet
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for my son's first band class, works great!
customer_reviews.author: Lijo Isac

customer_reviews.title: Get the Ebony clarinet!
customer_reviews.text: Make sure you buy the Ebony one. It has a much better sound!
customer_reviews.author: Kendrick's Graphic Designs

customer_reviews.title: After tons of cork grease and one playing session, ...
customer_reviews.text: After tons of cork grease and one playing session, I could not remove the bell or the barrel of the clarinet. I am going to a professional clarinet player later in the week to see if he can help me take it apart without breaking it. Otherwise I will just trash it if he can't help me since a professional repairman will probably cost more than the clarinet itself. The instrument plays okay but is probably not worth the cheaply made product. The cork is also coming off already from the mouthpiece and upper joint. Do not buy.
customer_reviews.author: Preston

customer_reviews.title: I won’t be purchasing from them again.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item for my 10 yr old son. He was so excited when it came in the mail! However, after opening the box we were disappointed it was missing the extra reeds, the clarinet stand was broken and the invoice wasn’t included so I was unable to request new items or replace missing/broken parts. I was very disappointed as was my son.
customer_reviews.author: beth y

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing.
customer_reviews.text: Just notice that this item not returnable or exchange if defective after a month.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Its Ok I guess..
customer_reviews.text: Its an ok product at first i bought this for my brothers who wanted it and once i got it i was skeptical. for one the product looks like a toy made with a weird type of plastic and I've seen an actual Clarinet and it looks and feels different. the wood reed after an hour brakes so i need new reeds and the gloves that come with it break in a mater of minutes. but its still sounds and plays the same.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Junk
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 4th grade daughters first instrument. It’s used 1-3 times a week and has broke in half in less than a year.
customer_reviews.author: chloe perkins

customer_reviews.title: good quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Got this product fast (live in Alaska). Came with everything pictured, good quality for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ebony McLane

customer_reviews.title: It was a waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: This clarinet came with a ligature that did not fit properly, and would slide off, I had to buy a new one just to “try” to play it. After I got that It still would not play properly. It was a waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: nicole g

customer_reviews.title: This clarinet is very poor quality. You get what you pay for and ...
customer_reviews.text: This clarinet is very poor quality. You get what you pay for and obviously this instrument is a prime example of that time tested saying. It is very difficult to piece together (even using cork wax) and sounds terrible. The thumb rest fell off after using it for about 3 hours total. Great service from the seller, just a poor choice in clarinets.
customer_reviews.author: Nimrod

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: First one I got did not function properly. Waiting for the replacement to arrive today.
customer_reviews.author: Tim

customer_reviews.title: Very good instrument
customer_reviews.text: Item came on time and I tried it and I love it even though it might take me a little while to learn to play it since I haven play one in a long time but everything came as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. Ambriz

customer_reviews.title: Worked fine while it lasted
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but somehow my son got it bent and at the repair shop I was told the is a chance it will break if they try to fix it.
customer_reviews.author: nadin6690

customer_reviews.title: Would love it to be replaced
customer_reviews.text: The screw that holds the thumb rest in, dose not stay in. The screw is stripped out. Would love it to be replaced.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: High quality, mellow tones, no problem
customer_reviews.text: I'm impressed with the quality, I could find no faults or defects. It goes together very easily and comes apart very easily. I use a cotton swab and cork grease the inside and outside of the sections. The clarinet has a smooth mellow tone, very pleasing. Of course I will be purchasing Yamaha mouthpieces, as I have with my saxophones.
customer_reviews.author: Shopper Sonny

customer_reviews.title: she is pleased with the instrument
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 7th grader who is taking band for the first time. So far, she is pleased with the instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Regina L Rivers

customer_reviews.title: My granddaughters clarinet.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clarinet for my 12 year old granddaughter and she's been very happy with it it was suitable for her band class and for the price I just went ahead and bought one as opposed to going to all the trouble to rent from The Music Store people who came to the school. I had purchased another clarinet it lasted about 3 years until something quit working she told me and for the cost which was similar to this one, I felt had got my money's worth. I hope she does band all the way through High School.
customer_reviews.author: Lottie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This instrument has been great for my daughter's middle school band class.
customer_reviews.author: CoSaundra O.

customer_reviews.title: Sounds great
customer_reviews.text: My son's instructor was quite impressed with it. It is a little heavy for him. He is only 6. I got him a neck strap and it is working well. Sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: motherof8

customer_reviews.title: Sounds good and works good but the thumb screw is already ...
customer_reviews.text: Purchased about a month ago. Sounds good and works good but the thumb screw is already stripped, and now my daughter has no way to hold it. Waiting to see if it is possible to buy a replacement one.
customer_reviews.author: Cassady

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Great product!! my son loves it!!! He did not stop playing ever since he got it. Beautiful and sweet sounding instrument. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Adam Badaoui

customer_reviews.title: Love it...
customer_reviews.text: Love it. I purchase this for my nephew. He is 5 it looks and sounds Great . A little to big for him but he can grow in to it.
customer_reviews.author: Walter m Phillips

customer_reviews.title: I'm pleased with the set for the price and the clarinetSeems ...
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is thrilled! I'm pleased with the set for the price and the clarinetSeems great for a first time player!
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Escala

customer_reviews.title: Nice Clarinet
customer_reviews.text: The first clarinet I received was defective (otherwise I would have given it a 5 star rating). The screw holding on the thumb rest was too short and kept falling off. So I returned it and ordered another one. The second clarinet was perfect. It looks nice, works well and has a good sound. My daughter has been using it for a couple of weeks now for 6th grade band and it is working perfectly for her needs. It is a great clarinet for beginners. Very happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Great for beginners..
customer_reviews.text: I bought this clarinet a month ago. I have been teaching myself to play. It is a great instrument for a beginner like me. With the cork grease provided was very difficult to put together, but when I purchased a cleaning kit from my local music store it came with some cork grease, which has made putting the clarinet together much easier. The sound of the instrument is nice and clear. The other accessories that came with the clarinet were nice, the gloves are cheaply made but for the price I paid wasn't expecting them to be perfect. I would recommend this clarinet to other beginners.
customer_reviews.author: pammy

customer_reviews.title: Great for school
customer_reviews.text: Got this clarinet for my 12 year old daughter, as she is in band for the second year, and last year alone I spent over $250 renting one from the local music store. Yes, the one from the music store was of better quality, but this one is almost as good and works perfect. So I definitely recommend this clarinet to anyone who has a school aged child that has been placed in band class and assigned the clarinet, because let’s face it, band is not for everyone and you do not want to throw away your money.
customer_reviews.author: Ed Martinez

customer_reviews.title: Luckily we found this one and his band teacher told us we got a very good instrument.
customer_reviews.text: My son joined band and we flipped out when we saw how much instruments were. Luckily we found this one and his band teacher told us we got a very good instrument.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: ... for a month now and it has been going pretty well. It was purchased for my daughter who ...
customer_reviews.text: I believe we had this for a month now and it has been going pretty well. It was purchased for my daughter who is in middle school and in addition to taking band as a class, has also joined the schools marching band.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Clarinet is perfect for my 10 yr old who is starting band ...
customer_reviews.text: Clarinet is perfect for my 10 yr old who is starting band in school this year. Says cork grease is included but it is not. Other than that GREAT INSTRUMENT for now
customer_reviews.author: Kay Den

customer_reviews.title: 4 stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this clarinet. I used to play for almost 6 years throughout school, until I unfortunately had to return it. Ever since, I've been looking for a new one to buy. This fit my needs perfectly, and I would recommend it to any beginner or intermediate musician. The only problem I've had is that the cork in between is a little flat. But otherwise it is excellent for its price.
customer_reviews.author: tigerkat

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for your new clarinetist
customer_reviews.text: Excellent clarinet for beginning band! Was approved by the teacher.
